timeline.message:
Expose standard limit macros

Add __STDC_LIMIT_MACROS to expose various <t>_MAX macros from limits.h.
See also #9091 and eclipse/omr#4645

Signed-off-by: Devin Nakamura <devinn@ca.ibm.com>
